verses.text: \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fortunes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* dreamers.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* glad \w shouts|strong="H7440"\w*; \w then|strong="H6213"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* greatly \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.’

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* greatly \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8056"\w*.

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w fortunes|strong="H7622"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* streams \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Negreb.
They who \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w in|strong="H2232"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* \w shall|strong="H1832"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w with|strong="H7114"\w* glad \w shouts|strong="H7440"\w*.

\w Forth|strong="H5375"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* fare, \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* burden \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w as|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*. But \w home|strong="H3212"\w*, \w home|strong="H3212"\w*, \w with|strong="H1980"\w* glad \w shouts|strong="H7440"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* arms full \w of|strong="H2233"\w* sheaves.
